scuffle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a short fight that is not very violent
scuffle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Scuffles broke out between rival supporters during the match.
scuffle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to have a short fight with someone, in a way that is not very serious or violent
scuffle.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Some of the demonstrators scuffled with the police.
scuffle.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to walk quickly and make a noise as your feet rub on the ground
